storyInfo: The second Summit of Nations gets underway, welcoming top-level delegations from every Terran nation, from Kazdel to Ægir. However, at a critical moment, an unexpected explosion occurred in Laterano. The newly-created Cardinal Lemuen is assigned to investigate the incident.

attributes.content: Finally, I can catch my breath.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I don't think I've talked so much in my entire life. And I've got another lifetime's worth of talking to do tomorrow.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Hah. How about we trade jobs, then?
I'll greet the Kazdelian delegation. You deal with the thirteen nomadic abbeys scheduled to arrive tomorrow. How's that?
All this running around is hard on my old bones.
That will not be necessary, Reverend Patrizion.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: How is communicating with our new Sarkaz friends?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Fine enough.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Not all the Sarkaz have set hatred aside. That ancient Revenant with Speaker Wiš'adel, for example, got rather worked up at the mere sight of the Matriarch.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: But the Speaker shut them up. She's been so magnanimous that I'm having trouble reconciling my impression with the rumors I've heard of her.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The chief spokesman for the Kazdelian delegation is a Lich by the name of Fremont. I wish you could have seen it—
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: A three-hour debate in which he engaged seventeen cardinals from the First and Sixth Tribunals in a, well, 'animated exchange of opinions', encompassing everything from politics to the Law, from faith to life and death.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Small wonder that whole procession of cardinals was spotted around the guava juice machine afterwards. They must've been soothing their parched lips and throats.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Such energy at his age! I envy the man.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Long story short, Kazdel accepted our proposal. The Royal Court will review the legacy of royal authority, and the Sarkaz will unite through the mediation of Laterano.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I have also spoken to the Empresses' Voice. The Leithanian delegation will arrive at the Holy City early tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Now that's something you don't see every day.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Remember how few answered the call of the first Summit of Nations two years ago. Most thought that the Lateran Declaration was little more than a piece of paper, empty posturing.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Empress Ewigegnade declined our invitation then. This time, she is proactively asking to take part in the Summit of Nations.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Even Empress Grimmacht, who has long been out of the public eye, came out of seclusion to join the envoy and visit Laterano...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It's a strong show of good faith from Leithanien.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Shall we say the second Summit of Nations has already met expectations?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Exceeded them, Cardinal Velliv.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Columbia, Ursus, Yan, even distant Ægir... all nations that should be here are now present.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It's like a dream.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Only the inevitable result of Laterano's development over the ages.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The prophesied calamity draws near. The black snow on the ice of Sami, the hole in the sky above Leithanien, even the raging tides that dash against the coast, are all portents of its inevitable arrival.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: In the face of calamity, everyone wants order—Lateran order.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You're correct. But even after all our preparation, the sight still feels... unfamiliar.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: If it's like that for you, imagine how it must be for everyone else. Even if one has heard of the path that Laterano has paved in response to the prophesied calamity countless times during one's enlightenment...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: One cannot help but hesitate when coming face-to-face with the ultimate end.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What about yourself?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: It's bad form to flaunt one's age, but when you get to be my age, there's not much to hesitate about.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Are you ready to retire?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I can hardly bite through a cactus tart these days. This summit may be the last thing I can do for Laterano.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: That might have more to do with your taste in food, Reverend... I would have a hard time biting through one of those, er, cactus tarts you're talking about.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You are aware that all the cactus tarts among the refreshments were made specially for you? Literally no one else in all of Laterano has any interest in them.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You must be joking. The cactus tarts were a recommendation from an old friend, a true connoisseur of desserts... what was his name again...?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. Back to the topic at hand.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The doubts among the people make the subsequent ceremony at the Shrine of Nurtury all the more important.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: We must show everyone, in the most forceful manner, the potential of Laterano.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Of course. I'll get on the handover of the Seventh Tribunal immediately. When the Summit of Nations gets underway, I will head to the Shrine and ensure that the ceremony is executed without a hitch.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: No need to rush.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Hah. Never mind. Young people are all the same... they complain a lot, but they have no patience when the time for action comes.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Are you reminded of your Fia?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I believe she has returned, according to the mission logs?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Yes. We'll have a family get-together tomorrow... I hope she likes my gift.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The Shrine of Nurtury...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: What a miracle.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen, Cardinal of the Seventh Tribunal. Go ahead.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Cardinal Lemuen, your presence is required at Via Jovita, Pagus Stevonus, to investigate a possible bombing.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Reverend Patrizion? I don't believe this was on today's schedule.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You may not understand, as you were recently created, but emergency assignments take precedence over all other arrangements, regardless of organ.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: An emergency assignment...? But where did this decision come from? Is there any documentation to reference?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Whether a situation is an emergency or not is always self-evident. There is no need for additional determination.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Someone of unknown identity and in possession of unregistered explosives has been seen in public multiple times without Notarial Hall oversight—
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: This is a grave threat to the order of Laterano. The centuries-long peace of the Holy City must not be broken by an illegal explosion during the Summit of Nations, with the eyes of all lands upon us.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The suspect has been sighted on Via Jovita in Pagus Stevonus. You are the nearest officer of the Curia.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Proceed to the scene immediately. Your aide and Notarial Hall executors will join you, ETA approximately ten minutes following your arrival.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: ...Lemuen.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What else do I need to know?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I had meant to congratulate you on your creation... but I guess it should wait for tomorrow's gathering.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Will you be there? We all know you've only gotten busier as your retirement draws near, and you always...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Always put my duties first? I can't deny that.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I've postponed meetings with old friends so many times that I can hardly remember their names, leaving me too embarrassed to meet them anymore.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: But I'll try to make the gathering tomorrow.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Take care, Reverend.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'll head to Via Jovita immediately.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Can you hear me?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen?
I'm near the Shrine of Nurtury, but something just came up and I need to be elsewhere.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Did you say something? I couldn't make it out. Why are you whispering? You're not the type to keep your voice down.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (No no no, Lemuen, you misunderstand...)
(I'm fine, but there's a... situation. I need to stay hidden and keep quiet.)
See you at Fiammetta's thing, then.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Sure.)
(Take care.)
Phew.
He's here! He might be whispering, but he can't fool my ears!
attributes.name: Proud Child

attributes.content: I didn't need you to guess where he is!
attributes.name: Obstinate Child

attributes.content: He's not behind the curtains or the pillars...
attributes.name: Obstinate Child

attributes.content: 'This wardrobe is only half his height. There's no way he could hide in here.'—Is what he'd want us to think!
attributes.name: Obstinate Child

attributes.content: What a dummy!
attributes.name: Proud Child

attributes.content: It's not that he's dumb, it's that we're too smart!
attributes.name: Obstinate Child

attributes.content: We found you, Senior Nurturer!
attributes.name: Proud Child and Obstinate Child

attributes.content: Alright, alright, you got me—thirty extra minutes of free time today!
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Yay!
attributes.name: Proud Child and Obstinate Child

attributes.content: Let's play 'Halo', Senior Nurturer!
attributes.name: Proud Child

attributes.content: I'll be the first to get in the bottle, the first one out the front, and the first one you hug! Then we'll hold hands and meet the other kids behind when they come out!
attributes.name: Proud Child

attributes.content: Are you bothering Andoain again, children?
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: They just want to play a little longer. It's all fine. Giselle, Romya, go make your preparations at the Hall of Enlightenment. We can start the game once I get there, okay?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Don't you ever say no to the children?
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: I guess that's why they trust you and look up to you...
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Just a few weeks ago, they were terrified of these unfamiliar halls. It was a struggle just to give them a change of clothes.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Now, they feel at home... all thanks to you.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: I didn't do anything, except stay with them.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You're very much like the Matriarch, down to your humility. Just having you with them makes all the difference.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Was it not your companionship that helped the mother you and the Matriarch brought back through the worst?
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: I remember the first thing the surgeon did after leaving the operating room was to check if he still had his halo.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: He could not understand how the mother managed to survive with her baby, after her abdomen was impaled by a spear.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: It was a miracle.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: We'll call it a miracle once she's successfully given birth. Meanwhile, I will continue to care for her as best as I can.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I'm... beginning to understand why the Matriarch holds you in such high regard. It is reassuring to know that you are in charge of the most important duty of the Nativity, the delivery of the child.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: The Shrine of Nurtury will be ready for full operation if the Nativity goes well. Every child born on Terra henceforth shall have the protection and blessing of the Holy City.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: That will be the true miracle.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: I hope so... I do hope so.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I must not keep you any longer. Giselle and Romya are still waiting for you!
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Via Jovita, Pagus Stevonus
It's quiet...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: A procession of halos stretches from one end of the street to the other. No one stops, and there is no commotion.
Someone may step out of the procession to enter a passing confessional, or pick up an ice cream cone from a dessert cart, before continuing on their soundless parade.
Silence and order. This is how things have always been in Laterano, the Holy City.
I'm in position.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Identifying suspicious personnel. No unusual activity at this time.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: A figure flashes by a corner in the distance. The wind blows her hood open briefly, revealing a streak of bright red.
